did.physloc: Churchill agrees to send photographs for Real Soldiers of Fortune(1906) which included a biography of Churchill.

did.unittitle: Jesse Lynch Williams to Richard Harding Davis May 31, 1906

Winston S. Churchill to Richard Harding Davis September 20, 1907

scopecontent.p: Churchill excuses Davis from any "malicious motive" for including material in Real Soldiers of Fortune(1906) that was inaccurate, "possibly-- libelous."
